law.catch_line: There is a Cease Fire Council Grant Program....

text.section: There is a Cease Fire Council Grant Program.
The Cease Fire Council Grant Program shall be funded as provided in the State budget.
Grants made by the Council shall be used to carry out the purposes of this subtitle.
Expenditures from the Cease Fire Council Grant Program may be made only in accordance with the State budget or by budget amendment.
The Council shall adopt regulations for the grant process and the oversight of grants made by the Council.
